name: Heat of the Kitchen
description: Heat of the Kitchen has served approximately 50 underserved high school youth per year at Ida B. Wells Continuation High School as an active, professional practice with a culinary theme in a weekly program. The students under the guidance and supervisor of skilled professionals are taught professional skills through our favorite culinary activities: planning, preparing, plating, serving, enjoying and cleaning up together. Supporting the indoors culinary education is an outdoor program at the gar
